keys: Estudios empresariales. Adquisición de conocimientos económicos. Notas
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81407</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81407</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4339</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">International Trade Factsheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa sobre Comercio internacional</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Fírice faoi Thrádáil Idirnáisiúnta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handel-Checkliste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données de Commerce international</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet Do Comércio Internacional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda Di Commercio Internazionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεθνές εμπορικό ενημερωτικό δελτίο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet outlining the importance of international trade for Ireland. Also includes an account of the problems facing exporters and info about Balance of Trade and Balance of Payments.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa que describe la importancia del comercio internacional para Irlanda. También incluye una exposición de los problemas a los que se enfrentan los exportadores e información sobre la Balanza comercial y la Balanza de Pagos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice a imlíníonn tábhacht na trádála idirnaisiúnta d’Éire. Tá cuntas freisin ar na fadhbanna atá os comhair easpórtálaithe agus eolas faoi Comhardú na Trádála agus Comhardú na nÍocaíochtaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales. Adquisición de conocimientos económicos. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Economic Awareness</string>
            <string language="ga">Feasacht Eacnamaíoch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste, die den Wert des zwischenstaatlichen 
Handels für Irland umreißt. Schließt auch ein Konto der 
Probleme ein, die Exporteure und Info über Handelsbilanz passive 
Handelsbilanz und Zahlungsbilanz gegenüberstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données traçant les grandes lignes de 
l'importance du commerce international pour l'Irlande. Inclut en
outre un compte des problèmes se posant à des exportateurs et à 
l'information au sujet de la balance commerciale et de la balance des 
paiements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet que esboça a importância do comércio 
internacional para Ireland. Inclui também um cliente dos 
problemas que enfrentam exportadores e info sobre o contrapeso de 
comércio e o contrapeso de pagamentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda che descrive importanza di commercio 
internazionale per l'Irlanda. Egualmente include un cliente dei 
problemi che affrontano gli esportatori e l'Info circa bilancia 
commerciale e bilancia dei pagamenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο που περιγράφει τη σημασία του 
διεθνούς εμπορίου για την Ιρλανδία. Επίσης περιλαμβάνει 
έναν απολογισμό των προβλημάτων που αντιμετωπίζουν τους εξαγωγείς
και τις πληροφορίες για την ισορροπία του εμπορίου και το ισοζύγιο
πληρωμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökonomisches Bewußtsein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conscience Économique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Consciência Econômica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consapevolezza Economica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομική συνειδητοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
